mapper.insert: insert into tb_topic_tip (userId, topicId, title, msg, pbarId, createTime) values (#{userId}, #{topicId}, #{title}, #{msg}, #{pbarId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM tb_topic_tip WHERE userId = #{userId} AND topicId = #{topicId}

SELECT ttt.id, COUNT(ttt.id) AS count, ttp.id AS topicId, ttp.title, ttt.title AS type FROM tb_topic_tip ttt JOIN tb_topic_post ttp ON ttp.id = ttt.topicId WHERE ttt.pbarId = #{pbarId} GROUP BY ttt.topicId LIMIT #{page}, 10
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_topic_tip WHERE topicId IN #{id}
